message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

This paper deals with semantic segmentation in the context of autonomous driving, which is a common topic in the computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO) communities. The use of thermal images is a key aspect of the proposed method, which could also be of interest to researchers in the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) communities. Finally, the paper also presents a new dataset and a novel calibration method, which could be relevant to researchers in the multimedia (cs.MM) community.
